thread.section_title: NameTagCountry.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of NameTagCountry.com | nametagcountry.com
thread.title: KRISTEN NAUSS

author: KRISTEN NAUSS
title: KRISTEN NAUSS
text: I was a bit of a newbie when I tried to navigate the website so I decided to call customer service. They were so personable, extremely helpful, and ran me through the whole process in a jiffy. THEN, the product arrived. Exactly as described and expected. I would definitely order again and will highly recommend NameTagCountry to anyone in need of these types of items. Beautiful work and fantastic customer service. Thank you!
